alert.note: Alert for Knox; Lewis; Shelby (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 2:58AM CST until February 16 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches, sleet accumulations between one tenth and two tenths of an inch, and a light glaze of ice accumulation. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Knox MO, Lewis MO, and Shelby MO Counties. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained at traveler.modot.org/map or by calling 1-888-275-6636.
